TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit AppDomainFactory extends System.Object implements class System.Web.Hosting.IAppDomainFactory

Docs.summary: Creates a new instance for the Web application. This class cannot be inherited. This class was used by earlier versions of the .NET Framework than version 2.0, which uses the class instead.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class. This class was used by earlier versions of the .NET Framework than version 2.0, which uses the class instead.

MemberSignature.Value: public object Create (string module, string typeName, string appId, string appPath, string strUrlOfAppOrigin, int iZone);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance object Create(string module, string typeName, string appId, string appPath, string strUrlOfAppOrigin, int32 iZone) cil managed

Docs.param: The module containing the Web application.
The type of the Web application.
The unique identifier for the Web application.
The path to the Web application's files.
The URL of origin for the Web application.
The zone of origin for the Web application.
Docs.summary: Returns a new application domain for the specified Web application. This class was used by earlier versions of the .NET Framework than version 2.0, which uses the class instead.
